org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings

Class AbstractStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings.AbstractBuilding
      • org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings.AlertableBuilding
        • org.dudss.nodeshot.buildings.AbstractStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Alertable, Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractIOStorage, AbstractMine, AmmoStorage, Turret

    public abstract class AbstractStorage
extends AlertableBuilding
    Building that can accept and hold items in a single shared storage pool.
